attributes.title: Rage Quit - Slender
attributes.caption: Slender
attributes.description: Michael and Gavin show you exclusive behind the scenes footage of Rage Quit - Slender Part 2. There's nothing quite like the look of fear in Gavin's eyes. So satisfying.

attributes.title: Dick Wave
attributes.description: Gav and Geoff give you an insight into how they keep themselves entertained while they wait for footage to render. This week they try to make a penis show up in the waveform using only their voice.

attributes.title: Messin' With Jacksquatch
attributes.caption: Behind the Scenes
attributes.description: When Jack is away, the rest of AH will make him miserable.

attributes.title: Capture the Tower
attributes.caption: Let's Play
attributes.description: The AH guys set up for their Capture the Tower Let's Play in Minecraft. It goes flawlessly.

attributes.title: Halo 4 - Regicide
attributes.caption: Let's Play
attributes.description: Let's Play set ups: they always go down smooth. Enjoy the Halo 4 Regicide aftertaste.

attributes.title: Mounted Combat
attributes.caption: Lets Play
attributes.description: AH sets up for Let's Play: Minecraft Ep 27 and enjoys some quality pig jousting.

attributes.title: Fishing Jamboree
attributes.caption: Let's Play
attributes.description: The lads gather for Let's Play: Minecraft Ep 28. Talk about some happy campers.
